<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vigorous Inspiration](/Feats.aspx?ID=1657) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You instill magical vigor in your allies when you inspire them to attack. If your next action is to cast the [_inspire courage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=386) composition cantrip, you and all affected allies gain temporary Hit Points equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier that last for 1 minute.
name: Vigorous Inspiration
